Html:
Hi

I'm new to jQuery and MVC 2 and so far very impressed with both. I want to build an application with jQuery UI controls that can work in an ASP.NET MVC 2 application. I want to use the ViewModel technique used in NerdDinner demo application whereby I just hook up the view model with my Views and the Views contain jQuery UI controls. Is that possible? If yes then how?

 

Cheers

Zohaib
